name: The-Fun-Bot
description: A Bot with some fun features and few group management features...

SESSION.description: You can use any session name as you wish...

ADMINS.description: Username or ID of Admins. Separate multiple Admins by space.

FSub_Channel.description: Type your force subscription channel's username without @

MOVIE_PIC.description: Give a telegraph image link which is used for Anti Movie Mode...

LOOK_IMG.description:
Give a telegraph image link which is used for How I Look Command. Separate multiple links by space.
Leave it empty if you don't want to add images as your wish.

START_IMG.description: Give a telegraph Image link which is used as Start Pic. Multiple Links can be separated by space.
